title: Plan des Necropoles Thebaines
creator: E Baraize; Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Āthār
extent: 4 maps ; 54 x 71 cm, folded in portfolio 41 x 31 cm
description: These maps were issued as part of a set of maps; only Parts 1-4 of this set were published from 1904-1913. "Levé par E. Baraize, opérateur du Service des antiquités." Cf. NUC. Relief shown by hachures.
subject: Cemeteries -- Egypt -- Thebes (Extinct city) -- Maps; Tombs -- Egypt -- Thebes (Extinct city) -- Maps; Thebes (Egypt : Extinct city) -- Maps.
